str2: Who, which, what, that, when, where, how, because, in order that

str2: To cut in, engrave, plow, devise
Strictly nothingness, trouble, vanity, wickedness, an idol

parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Participle - masculine plural construct

str2: To dock off, curtail, to harvest
